Ramhorn/Stinkbomb:



    Stinkbomb, half-dead (even more) from Ramhorn's charge, which luckily the 
blast was almost to far away to hit him, though his once light armor was now 
a charred black, half of his left optic missing, leaking mech-fl all over.  
Seeing Suukie approach, he raised his rifle, waiting until Suukie stepped up 
to him and fired at his middle.  Lauguidhing, since he had a big huge hole in 
his middle (which, will undoubtedly kill him), the lasers merely hitting the 
wall behind him (though pieces of the wall piercing into his back, Stinkbomb 
was way gone so he couldn't even feel it).  Not even wondering how Suukie 
mystically got repaired, he shoved his heavy laser rifle up to diagonally at 
the bottom of Suukie's chin (though a few millimeters away), pulling the 
trigger repeatedly, slashing his seringed and very deadly tail up at the 
middle of Suukie's chest.

-----------

    Ramhorn, stepped into the armory of the Ark, not seeing anyone on the 
way.  -Dang, it's a ghost ship- the temporarily insane robot thinking, coming 
back into reality, no longer crazy.  "Stinkbomb, by Primus, what have I 
done!" he yelled, grabbing a missile launcher and running as fast as his 
damaged legs could carry him, each 'step' banging against the 'ancient' metal 
flooor, stopping at the door of the Ark gradually, the door slid up 
automatically, the Maximal running in, seeing the fight between Suukie.  
Yelling, "Stinkbomb, hold on, I'll kill the traitor!", he raised the missile 
launcher, stopping 6 feet behind Suukie, firing off a rocket at the middile 
of his back, swearing in ancient Cybertronian (a way Ramhorn likes to show 
off to everyone).
